name: The holy ONE (fixed (a little bit))
description:
+++ some glitches were fixed after the upload time was over; if you want to see the original game, click here: https://mosaicdev.itch.io/theholyone +++

Created in 48 hours for the GMTK game jam 2019 (Theme: only one).

Rating: https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2019/rate/460686

Do you want to be a hero? Yes? Then you've come to the wrong place! So get on with it and play this game. Be a blob and save the ONE.

#### CONTROLS ####

There's not much to say about that. Just press SPACE. That should be enough. Only one key, eh?

#### LOOK OUT FOR THESE THINGS OR YOU WILL GET YOURSELF KILLED (INGAME OF COURSE) ####

You are not able to look in more than only one direction (notice something?). And that is forwards. (Un)fortunately you're also able to go back. 

Spikes are deadly, as well as the colourful corrupted thingys, blah, blah, blah.

+++ AD: I got the beatiful music from this very beatiful website that is named after a common fish: https://www.musicfox.com/ +++

Ready? Let's flip some switches!
